definitions: a machine designed to detect and record changes in physiological characteristics, such as a person's pulse and breathing rates, used especially as a lie detector.
shortDefinitions: machine designed to detect and record changes in physiological characteristics, such as person's pulse and breathing rates

definitions: a lie-detector test carried out with a polygraph

examples.text: if he passed the polygraph, of course, it would authenticate his story

shortDefinitions: lie-detector test carried out with polygraph
